<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4+"
    pfs=""
>
[Warcaller's Chime](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1093)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 77</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The Nantambu Chime-Ringers created these magical chimes to aid in their defense of their city. Each chime is made from elaborately carved wood depicting the nature of a given chime's power.

<document level="2" id="action-889" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Limited"
>
Warcaller's Chime of Blasting
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 77</row>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

This chime features carvings of destructive runes. When activated, it creates the effects of a 3rd-level [_sound burst_](/Spells.aspx?ID=292) centered on you (DC 20 Fortitude save). Instead of the spell's normal range, it has a 5-foot emanation. In addition, creatures that critically fail their save are knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) by the chime's effect. You can use this chime once per day.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 4"
pfs="Limited"
>
Warcaller's Chime of Destruction
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 77</row>

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

A series of shattered mountains are carved into this chime. When activated, you touch the chime against an unattended object, casting [_shatter_](/Spells.aspx?ID=279) upon the object, ignoring the object's Hardness if it's 6 or lower. You can use this chime once per day.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Limited"
>
Warcaller's Chime of Dread
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 77</row>

**Price** 1,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

This chime's carvings depict skulls and other grim icons. When activated, it creates an aura of fear in a 5-foot emanation for 1 round. Creatures in the aura must attempt a DC 27 Will save. On a failure, they become [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) (frightened 2 on a critical failure). Affected creatures can't reduce their frightened condition below frightened 1 while the chime is ringing. You can Sustain the Activation to sustain the aura, up to a total of 5 rounds. This chime can be used only once per day, whether or not you Sustain the aura.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 8"
pfs="Limited"
>
Warcaller's Chime of Refuge
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 77</row>

**Price** 500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

This chime's carvings depict a series of warding runes that evoke feelings of serene protection. When activated, you touch the chime to yourself or a willing creature. The target gains the effects of [_sanctuary_](/Spells.aspx?ID=266) (DC 20 Will save). You can use this chime up to five times per day, but each use must target a different creature.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Limited"
>
Warcaller's Chime of Resistance
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 77</row>

**Price** 160 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

This chime features several elemental runes in its carvings. When activated, it creates a defensive aura in a 5-foot emanation. As you activate the chime, choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic. You and creatures in the aura gain resistance 5 against the damage type you chose. This aura remains active for 10 minutes. This chime can be used once per week.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"
pfs="Limited"
>
Warcaller's Chime of Restoration
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 77</row>

**Price** 2,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

This chime's carvings depict blooming flowers. When activated, it creates a small aura of healing in a 5-foot emanation. Creatures in the aura gain [fast healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=15) 15. This aura remains active for 3 rounds. This chime can be used once per week.
